Vanilla.name: Ancestral Healing
Vanilla.text: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt.
Vanilla.flavor: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

Vanilla.name: Backstab
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
Vanilla.flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

Vanilla.name: Circle of Healing
Vanilla.text: Restore #4 Health to ALL_minions.
Vanilla.flavor: It isn't really a circle.

Vanilla.name: Hunter's Mark
Vanilla.text: Change a minion's Health to 1.
Vanilla.flavor: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

Vanilla.name: Inner Rage
Vanilla.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and give it +2_Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: They're only smiling on the outside.

Vanilla.name: Innervate
Vanilla.text: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only.
Vanilla.flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

Vanilla.name: Moonfire
Vanilla.text: Deal $1 damage.
Vanilla.flavor: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

Vanilla.name: Preparation
Vanilla.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less.
Vanilla.flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

Vanilla.name: Sacrificial Pact
Vanilla.text: Destroy a Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
Vanilla.flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

Vanilla.name: Shadowstep
Vanilla.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It_costs (2) less.
Vanilla.flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.

Vanilla.name: Silence
Vanilla.text: Silence a minion.
Vanilla.flavor: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

Vanilla.name: Soulfire
Vanilla.text:
[x]Deal $4 damage.
Discard a random card.
Vanilla.flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

Vanilla.name: Totemic Might
Vanilla.text: Give your Totems +2_Health.
Vanilla.flavor: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

Vanilla.name: Wisp
Vanilla.flavor: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode.   But why?

Vanilla.name: Abusive Sergeant
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2_Attack this turn.
Vanilla.flavor: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

Vanilla.name: Angry Chicken
Vanilla.text: Enrage: +5 Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

Vanilla.name: Arcane Missiles
Vanilla.text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemy characters.
Vanilla.flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

Vanilla.name: Arcane Shot
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage.
Vanilla.flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

Vanilla.name: Argent Squire
Vanilla.text: Divine Shield
Vanilla.flavor: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

Vanilla.name: Bestial Wrath
Vanilla.text: Give a Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
Vanilla.flavor: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

Vanilla.name: Blessing of Might
Vanilla.text: Give a minion +3_Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

Vanilla.name: Blessing of Wisdom
Vanilla.text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

Vanilla.name: Blood Imp
Vanilla.text: [x] Stealth. At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
Vanilla.flavor: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

Vanilla.name: Bloodsail Corsair
Vanilla.text: [x]Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
Vanilla.flavor: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It's called the "Pirate's Code".

Vanilla.name: Claw
Vanilla.text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor.
Vanilla.flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

Vanilla.name: Cold Blood
Vanilla.text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
Vanilla.flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

Vanilla.name: Conceal
Vanilla.text: Give your minions Stealth until your next_turn.
Vanilla.flavor: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

Vanilla.name: Corruption
Vanilla.text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
Vanilla.flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOOM!  Corrupted!

Vanilla.name: Deadly Poison
Vanilla.text: Give your weapon +2_Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

Vanilla.name: Dust Devil
Vanilla.text: Windfury. Overload: (2)
Vanilla.flavor: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

Vanilla.name: Earth Shock
Vanilla.text: Silence a minion, then deal $1 damage to it.
Vanilla.flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

Vanilla.name: Elven Archer
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
Vanilla.flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

Vanilla.name: Execute
Vanilla.text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
Vanilla.flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

Vanilla.name: Eye for an Eye
Vanilla.text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal_that much damage to the enemy hero.
Vanilla.flavor: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

Vanilla.name: Flame Imp
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
Vanilla.flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

Vanilla.name: Flare
Vanilla.text: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!

Vanilla.name: Forked Lightning
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage to 2_random enemy minions. Overload: (2)
Vanilla.flavor: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

Vanilla.name: Frost Shock
Vanilla.text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
Vanilla.flavor: FROST SHOCK!

Vanilla.name: Goldshire Footman
Vanilla.text: Taunt
Vanilla.flavor: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

Vanilla.name: Grimscale Oracle
Vanilla.text: ALL other Murlocs have +1 Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

Vanilla.name: Hand of Protection
Vanilla.text: Give a minion Divine Shield.
Vanilla.flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

Vanilla.name: Holy Smite
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage.
Vanilla.flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

Vanilla.name: Humility
Vanilla.text: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
Vanilla.flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

Vanilla.name: Hungry Crab
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2.
Vanilla.flavor: Murloc.  It's what's for dinner.

Vanilla.name: Ice Lance
Vanilla.text: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal $4 damage instead.
Vanilla.flavor: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

Vanilla.name: Inner Fire
Vanilla.text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
Vanilla.flavor: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

Vanilla.name: Leper Gnome
Vanilla.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy_hero.
Vanilla.flavor: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

Vanilla.name: Light's Justice
Vanilla.flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

Vanilla.name: Lightning Bolt
Vanilla.text: Deal $3 damage. Overload: (1)
Vanilla.flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

Vanilla.name: Lightwarden
Vanilla.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

Vanilla.name: Mana Wyrm
Vanilla.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

Vanilla.name: Mind Vision
Vanilla.text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
Vanilla.flavor: I see what you did there.

Vanilla.name: Mirror Image
Vanilla.text: Summon two 0/2 minions with Taunt.
Vanilla.flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

Vanilla.name: Mortal Coil
Vanilla.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

Vanilla.name: Murloc Raider
Vanilla.flavor: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

Vanilla.name: Murloc Tidecaller
Vanilla.text: Whenever a Murloc is summoned, gain +1 Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

Vanilla.name: Naturalize
Vanilla.text:
Destroy a minion.
Your opponent draws 2_cards.
Vanilla.flavor: Another one bites the dust.

Vanilla.name: Noble Sacrifice
Vanilla.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
Vanilla.flavor: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

Vanilla.name: Northshire Cleric
Vanilla.text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

Vanilla.name: Power Overwhelming
Vanilla.text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
Vanilla.flavor: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.

Vanilla.name: Power Word: Shield
Vanilla.text:
Give a minion +2_Health.
Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

Vanilla.name: Redemption
Vanilla.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
Vanilla.flavor: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!

Vanilla.name: Repentance
Vanilla.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
Vanilla.flavor: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

Vanilla.name: Rockbiter Weapon
Vanilla.text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
Vanilla.flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

Vanilla.name: Savagery
Vanilla.text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
Vanilla.flavor: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

Vanilla.name: Secretkeeper
Vanilla.text: Whenever a Secret is played, gain +1/+1.
Vanilla.flavor: Where is Mankrik’s wife? She’ll never tell.

Vanilla.name: Shield Slam
Vanilla.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
Vanilla.flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

Vanilla.name: Shieldbearer
Vanilla.text: Taunt
Vanilla.flavor: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.

Vanilla.name: Sinister Strike
Vanilla.text: Deal $3 damage to the_enemy hero.
Vanilla.flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

Vanilla.name: Southsea Deckhand
Vanilla.text: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
Vanilla.flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

Vanilla.name: Stonetusk Boar
Vanilla.text: Charge
Vanilla.flavor: This card is boaring.

Vanilla.name: Timber Wolf
Vanilla.text: Your other Beasts have +1_Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

Vanilla.name: Tracking
Vanilla.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others.
Vanilla.flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

Vanilla.name: Upgrade!
Vanilla.text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
Vanilla.flavor: Easily worth 50 DKP.

Vanilla.name: Voidwalker
Vanilla.text: Taunt
Vanilla.flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

Vanilla.name: Voodoo Doctor
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Restore #2_Health.
Vanilla.flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

Vanilla.name: Whirlwind
Vanilla.text: Deal $1 damage to ALL_minions.
Vanilla.flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

Vanilla.name: Worgen Infiltrator
Vanilla.text: Stealth
Vanilla.flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

Vanilla.name: Young Dragonhawk
Vanilla.text: Windfury
Vanilla.flavor: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

Vanilla.name: Young Priestess
Vanilla.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
Vanilla.flavor: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

Vanilla.name: Acidic Swamp Ooze
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
Vanilla.flavor: Oozes love Flamenco.  Don't ask.

Vanilla.name: Amani Berserker
Vanilla.text: Enrage: +3 Attack
Vanilla.flavor: If an Amani berserker asks "Joo lookin' at me?!", the correct response is "Nah, mon".

Vanilla.name: Ancestral Spirit
Vanilla.text: Choose a minion. When that minion is destroyed, return it to the battlefield.
Vanilla.flavor: It was just a flesh wound.

Vanilla.name: Ancient Watcher
Vanilla.text: Can't attack.
Vanilla.flavor: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

Vanilla.name: Arcane Explosion
Vanilla.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
Vanilla.flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

Vanilla.name: Argent Protector
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
Vanilla.flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

Vanilla.name: Armorsmith
Vanilla.text: Whenever a friendly minion_takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
Vanilla.flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

Vanilla.name: Battle Rage
Vanilla.text: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
Vanilla.flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

Vanilla.name: Betrayal
Vanilla.text: Force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it.
Vanilla.flavor: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

Vanilla.name: Blade Flurry
Vanilla.text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemies.
Vanilla.flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

Vanilla.name: Bloodfen Raptor
Vanilla.flavor: "Kill 30 raptors." - Hemet Nesingwary

Vanilla.name: Bloodmage Thalnos
Vanilla.text: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

Vanilla.name: Bloodsail Raider
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
Vanilla.flavor: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

Vanilla.name: Bluegill Warrior
Vanilla.text: Charge
Vanilla.flavor: He just wants a hug.   A sloppy... slimy... hug.

Vanilla.name: Captain's Parrot
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate from your deck.
Vanilla.flavor: Pirates and Parrots go together like Virmen and Carrots.

Vanilla.name: Cleave
Vanilla.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to
two random enemy
minions.
Vanilla.flavor: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

Vanilla.name: Commanding Shout
Vanilla.text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

Vanilla.name: Crazed Alchemist
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
Vanilla.flavor: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

Vanilla.name: Cruel Taskmaster
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2_Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

Vanilla.name: Defias Ringleader
Vanilla.text: Combo: Summon a 2/1 Defias Bandit.
Vanilla.flavor: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

Vanilla.name: Demonfire
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it’s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.
Vanilla.flavor: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

Vanilla.name: Dire Wolf Alpha
Vanilla.text: Adjacent minions have +1_Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

Vanilla.name: Divine Spirit
Vanilla.text: Double a minion's Health.
Vanilla.flavor: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

Vanilla.name: Doomsayer
Vanilla.text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
Vanilla.flavor: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

Vanilla.name: Equality
Vanilla.text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
Vanilla.flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

Vanilla.name: Eviscerate
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage. Combo: Deal $4 damage instead.
Vanilla.flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent. You might tweak your elbow! That really hurts!

Vanilla.name: Explosive Trap
Vanilla.text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.
Vanilla.flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

Vanilla.name: Faerie Dragon
Vanilla.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Vanilla.flavor: Adorable.  Immune to Magic.  Doesn't pee on the rug.  The perfect pet!

Vanilla.name: Felstalker
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Discard a random card.
Vanilla.flavor: This puppy chews up cards instead of shoes.

Vanilla.name: Fiery War Axe
Vanilla.flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

Vanilla.name: Flametongue Totem
Vanilla.text: Adjacent minions have +2_Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

Vanilla.name: Freezing Trap
Vanilla.text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
Vanilla.flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

Vanilla.name: Frostbolt
Vanilla.text: Deal $3 damage to a_character and Freeze it.
Vanilla.flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

Vanilla.name: Frostwolf Grunt
Vanilla.text: Taunt
Vanilla.flavor: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It's more than just a job.

Vanilla.name: Heroic Strike
Vanilla.text: Give your hero +4_Attack this turn.
Vanilla.flavor: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

Vanilla.name: Holy Light
Vanilla.text: Restore #6 Health.
Vanilla.flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

Vanilla.name: Ironbeak Owl
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Silence a_minion.
Vanilla.flavor: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

Vanilla.name: Knife Juggler
Vanilla.text:
[x]After you summon a
minion, deal 1 damage
to a random enemy.
Vanilla.flavor: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers.    They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

Vanilla.name: Kobold Geomancer
Vanilla.text: Spell Damage +1
Vanilla.flavor: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

Vanilla.name: Lightwell
Vanilla.text: At the start of your turn, restore #3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
Vanilla.flavor: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

Vanilla.name: Loot Hoarder
Vanilla.text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: Always roll need.

Vanilla.name: Lorewalker Cho
Vanilla.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other player’s hand.
Vanilla.flavor: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

Vanilla.name: Mad Bomber
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
Vanilla.flavor: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

Vanilla.name: Mana Addict
Vanilla.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack this turn.
Vanilla.flavor: She’s trying to kick the habit, but still takes some mana whenever she has a stressful day.

Vanilla.name: Mana Wraith
Vanilla.text: ALL minions cost (1) more.
Vanilla.flavor: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

Vanilla.name: Mark of the Wild
Vanilla.text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+2. (+2 Attack/+2 Health)
Vanilla.flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

Vanilla.name: Master Swordsmith
Vanilla.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: He's currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can't be done.

Vanilla.name: Millhouse Manastorm
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (0) next turn.
Vanilla.flavor: "I'm gonna light you up, sweetcheeks!"

Vanilla.name: Mind Blast
Vanilla.text: Deal $5 damage to the enemy hero.
Vanilla.flavor: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

Vanilla.name: Misdirection
Vanilla.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, instead it attacks another random character.
Vanilla.flavor: Sometimes it's as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.

Vanilla.name: Murloc Tidehunter
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1_Murloc Scout.
Vanilla.flavor: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

Vanilla.name: Nat Pagle
Vanilla.text: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
Vanilla.flavor: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman!  He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

Vanilla.name: Novice Engineer
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

Vanilla.name: Patient Assassin
Vanilla.text: Stealth. Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.
Vanilla.flavor: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

Vanilla.name: Pint-Sized Summoner
Vanilla.text: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.
Vanilla.flavor: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

Vanilla.name: Power of the Wild
Vanilla.text: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
Vanilla.flavor: Never look a panther in the eye.  Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'?  Well, it's one of those.

Vanilla.name: Rampage
Vanilla.text: Give a damaged minion +3/+3.
Vanilla.flavor: Minion get ANGRY.   Minion SMASH!

Vanilla.name: River Crocolisk
Vanilla.flavor: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

Vanilla.name: Sap
Vanilla.text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
Vanilla.flavor: Rogues love sappy movies.

Vanilla.name: Scavenging Hyena
Vanilla.text: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
Vanilla.flavor: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything.  Even Brussels sprouts.

Vanilla.name: Shadow Word: Pain
Vanilla.text: Destroy a minion with 3_or less Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

Vanilla.name: Shiv
Vanilla.text:
Deal $1 damage.
Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

Vanilla.name: Slam
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

Vanilla.name: Snake Trap
Vanilla.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.
Vanilla.flavor: Why did it have to be snakes?

Vanilla.name: Snipe
Vanilla.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $4 damage to it.
Vanilla.flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

Vanilla.name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
Vanilla.text: Your spells cost (1) less.
Vanilla.flavor: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

Vanilla.name: Starving Buzzard
Vanilla.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

Vanilla.name: Stormforged Axe
Vanilla.text: Overload: (1)
Vanilla.flavor: Yo, that's a nice axe.

Vanilla.name: Sunfury Protector
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Taunt.
Vanilla.flavor: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

Vanilla.name: Wild Growth
Vanilla.text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Vanilla.flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

Vanilla.name: Wild Pyromancer
Vanilla.text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
Vanilla.flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

Vanilla.name: Windfury
Vanilla.text: Give a minion Windfury.
Vanilla.flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

Vanilla.name: Wrath
Vanilla.text: Choose One - Deal $3 damage to a minion; or $1 damage and draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

Vanilla.name: Youthful Brewmaster
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
Vanilla.flavor: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews.   Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

Vanilla.name: Acolyte of Pain
Vanilla.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a_card.
Vanilla.flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

Vanilla.name: Alarm-o-Bot
Vanilla.text:
[x]At the start of your turn,
swap this minion with a
   random one in your hand.
Vanilla.flavor: WARNING.  WARNING.  WARNING.

Vanilla.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Change an_enemy minion's Attack to 1.
Vanilla.flavor: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

Vanilla.name: Animal Companion
Vanilla.text: Summon a random Beast Companion.
Vanilla.flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

Vanilla.name: Arcane Golem
Vanilla.text: Charge. Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
Vanilla.flavor: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

Vanilla.name: Arcane Intellect
Vanilla.text: Draw 2 cards.
Vanilla.flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

Vanilla.name: Big Game Hunter
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

Vanilla.name: Blood Knight
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
Vanilla.flavor: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

Vanilla.name: Charge
Vanilla.text: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack and Charge.
Vanilla.flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

Vanilla.name: Coldlight Oracle
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Each player draws 2 cards.
Vanilla.flavor: They can see the future.   In that future both players draw more cards.   Spoooky.

Vanilla.name: Coldlight Seer
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give ALL other Murlocs +2 Health.
Vanilla.flavor: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths.  So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

Vanilla.name: Counterspell
Vanilla.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
Vanilla.flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

Vanilla.name: Dalaran Mage
Vanilla.text: Spell Damage +1
Vanilla.flavor: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

Vanilla.name: Deadly Shot
Vanilla.text: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Vanilla.flavor: Our ballista operator is effective, but not picky.

Vanilla.name: Demolisher
Vanilla.text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Vanilla.flavor: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone.  It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

Vanilla.name: Divine Favor
Vanilla.text: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
Vanilla.flavor: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

Vanilla.name: Drain Life
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
Vanilla.flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

Vanilla.name: Eaglehorn Bow
Vanilla.text: Whenever a Secret is revealed, gain +1 Durability.
Vanilla.flavor: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

Vanilla.name: Earthen Ring Farseer
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Restore #3_Health.
Vanilla.flavor: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

Vanilla.name: Edwin VanCleef
Vanilla.text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each card played earlier this turn.
Vanilla.flavor: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

Vanilla.name: Emperor Cobra
Vanilla.text: Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.
Vanilla.flavor: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you're going to visit, wear bug spray.  And plate armor.

Vanilla.name: Fan of Knives
Vanilla.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw_a card.
Vanilla.flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

Vanilla.name: Far Sight
Vanilla.text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
Vanilla.flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

Vanilla.name: Felguard
Vanilla.text: Taunt Battlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
Vanilla.flavor: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

Vanilla.name: Feral Spirit
Vanilla.text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (2)
Vanilla.flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

Vanilla.name: Flesheating Ghoul
Vanilla.text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name.  It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

Vanilla.name: Frost Nova
Vanilla.text: Freeze all enemy minions.
Vanilla.flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

Vanilla.name: Frothing Berserker
Vanilla.text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

Vanilla.name: Harvest Golem
Vanilla.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Damaged Golem.
Vanilla.flavor: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

Vanilla.name: Headcrack
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
Vanilla.flavor: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

Vanilla.name: Healing Touch
Vanilla.text: Restore #8 Health.
Vanilla.flavor: 8 Health, no waiting.

Vanilla.name: Hex
Vanilla.text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
Vanilla.flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

Vanilla.name: Ice Barrier
Vanilla.text: [x]Secret: As soon as your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
Vanilla.flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

Vanilla.name: Ice Block
Vanilla.text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
Vanilla.flavor: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

Vanilla.name: Imp Master
Vanilla.text:
[x]At the end of your turn, deal
1 damage to this minion
and summon a 1/1 Imp.
Vanilla.flavor: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.

Vanilla.name: Injured Blademaster
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to HIMSELF.
Vanilla.flavor: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

Vanilla.name: Ironforge Rifleman
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
Vanilla.flavor: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

Vanilla.name: Ironfur Grizzly
Vanilla.text: Taunt
Vanilla.flavor: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

Vanilla.name: Jungle Panther
Vanilla.text: Stealth
Vanilla.flavor: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

Vanilla.name: Kill Command
Vanilla.text:
Deal $3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal
$5 damage instead.
Vanilla.flavor: "Kill!", he commanded.

Vanilla.name: King Mukla
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give your opponent 2 Bananas.
Vanilla.flavor: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

Vanilla.name: Kirin Tor Mage
Vanilla.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
Vanilla.flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

Vanilla.name: Lava Burst
Vanilla.text: Deal $5 damage. Overload: (2)
Vanilla.flavor: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

Vanilla.name: Lightning Storm
Vanilla.text: Deal $2-$3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (2)
Vanilla.flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

Vanilla.name: Magma Rager
Vanilla.flavor: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

Vanilla.name: Mana Tide Totem
Vanilla.text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

Vanilla.name: Mark of Nature
Vanilla.text: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
Vanilla.flavor: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

Vanilla.name: Mind Control Tech
Vanilla.text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent has 4 or more minions, take control of one at random.
Vanilla.flavor: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that's not saying much.

Vanilla.name: Mirror Entity
Vanilla.text: [x]Secret: When your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
Vanilla.flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

Vanilla.name: Murloc Warleader
Vanilla.text: ALL other murlocs have +2/+1.
Vanilla.flavor: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

Vanilla.name: Perdition's Blade
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Combo: Deal 2 instead.
Vanilla.flavor: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

Vanilla.name: Questing Adventurer
Vanilla.text: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
Vanilla.flavor: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

Vanilla.name: Raging Worgen
Vanilla.text: Enrage: Windfury and +1 Attack
Vanilla.flavor: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

Vanilla.name: Raid Leader
Vanilla.text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

Vanilla.name: Razorfen Hunter
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1_Boar.
Vanilla.flavor: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

Vanilla.name: Savage Roar
Vanilla.text: Give your characters +2_Attack this turn.
Vanilla.flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

Vanilla.name: Scarlet Crusader
Vanilla.text: Divine Shield
Vanilla.flavor: Never wash your whites with a Scarlet Crusader.

Vanilla.name: Sense Demons
Vanilla.text:
Draw 2 Demons
from your deck.
Vanilla.flavor: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

Vanilla.name: Shadow Bolt
Vanilla.text:
Deal $4 damage
to a minion.
Vanilla.flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

Vanilla.name: Shadow Word: Death
Vanilla.text: Destroy a minion with 5_or more Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

Vanilla.name: Shadowform
Vanilla.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.' If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.
Vanilla.flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

Vanilla.name: Shattered Sun Cleric
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1.
Vanilla.flavor: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

Vanilla.name: Shield Block
Vanilla.text:
Gain 5 Armor.
Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

Vanilla.name: SI:7 Agent
Vanilla.text: Combo: Deal 2 damage.
Vanilla.flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

Vanilla.name: Silverback Patriarch
Vanilla.text: Taunt
Vanilla.flavor: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

Vanilla.name: Southsea Captain
Vanilla.text: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
Vanilla.flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.

Vanilla.name: Spellbender
Vanilla.text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
Vanilla.flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

Vanilla.name: Sword of Justice
Vanilla.text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1_Durability.
Vanilla.flavor: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

Vanilla.name: Tauren Warrior
Vanilla.text: Taunt. Enrage: +3 Attack
Vanilla.flavor: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

Vanilla.name: Thoughtsteal
Vanilla.text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
Vanilla.flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

Vanilla.name: Thrallmar Farseer
Vanilla.text: Windfury
Vanilla.flavor: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

Vanilla.name: Tinkmaster Overspark
Vanilla.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform another random minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel.
Vanilla.flavor: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.

Vanilla.name: Unbound Elemental
Vanilla.text: Whenever you play a card_with Overload, gain_+1/+1.
Vanilla.flavor: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

Vanilla.name: Unleash the Hounds
Vanilla.text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
Vanilla.flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

Vanilla.name: Vaporize
Vanilla.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
Vanilla.flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

Vanilla.name: Void Terror
Vanilla.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy both adjacent minions and gain their Attack and Health.
Vanilla.flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

Vanilla.name: Warsong Commander
Vanilla.text: Whenever you summon a minion with 3 or less Attack, give it Charge.
Vanilla.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

Vanilla.name: Wolfrider
Vanilla.text: Charge
Vanilla.flavor: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

Vanilla.name: Ancient Brewmaster
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
Vanilla.flavor: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak.  But apparently that's a compliment.

Vanilla.name: Ancient Mage
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent_minions Spell_Damage +1.
Vanilla.flavor: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

Vanilla.name: Arathi Weaponsmith
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2_weapon.
Vanilla.flavor: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

Vanilla.name: Auchenai Soulpriest
Vanilla.text: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
Vanilla.flavor: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

Vanilla.name: Bite
Vanilla.text: Give your hero +4_Attack this turn. Gain 4 Armor.
Vanilla.flavor: Chew your food!

Vanilla.name: Blessing of Kings
Vanilla.text: Give a minion +4/+4. (+4 Attack/+4 Health)
Vanilla.flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

Vanilla.name: Chillwind Yeti
Vanilla.flavor: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

Vanilla.name: Cone of Cold
Vanilla.text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.
Vanilla.flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

Vanilla.name: Consecration
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies.
Vanilla.flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

Vanilla.name: Cult Master
Vanilla.text: After a friendly minion dies, draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

Vanilla.name: Dark Iron Dwarf
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2_Attack this turn.
Vanilla.flavor: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.  Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

Vanilla.name: Defender of Argus
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
Vanilla.flavor: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

Vanilla.name: Dragonling Mechanic
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Mechanical Dragonling.
Vanilla.flavor: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

Vanilla.name: Dread Corsair
Vanilla.text: Taunt Costs (1) less per Attack of_your weapon.
Vanilla.flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

Vanilla.name: Ethereal Arcanist
Vanilla.text: If you control a Secret at_the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
Vanilla.flavor: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

Vanilla.name: Fireball
Vanilla.text: Deal $6 damage.
Vanilla.flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

Vanilla.name: Gnomish Inventor
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

Vanilla.name: Hammer of Wrath
Vanilla.text:
Deal $3 damage.
Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

Vanilla.name: Hellfire
Vanilla.text: Deal $3 damage to ALL_characters.
Vanilla.flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

Vanilla.name: Houndmaster
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
Vanilla.flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

Vanilla.name: Keeper of the Grove
Vanilla.text: Choose One - Deal_2_damage; or Silence a minion.
Vanilla.flavor: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

Vanilla.name: Kor'kron Elite
Vanilla.text: Charge
Vanilla.flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

Vanilla.name: Leeroy Jenkins
Vanilla.text: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
Vanilla.flavor: At least he has Angry Chicken.

Vanilla.name: Lightspawn
Vanilla.text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
Vanilla.flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

Vanilla.name: Mass Dispel
Vanilla.text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

Vanilla.name: Master of Disguise
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth.
Vanilla.flavor: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

Vanilla.name: Mindgames
Vanilla.text:
Put a copy of
a random minion from
your opponent's deck into the battlefield.
Vanilla.flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

Vanilla.name: Mogu'shan Warden
Vanilla.text: Taunt
Vanilla.flavor: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

Vanilla.name: Mortal Strike
Vanilla.text: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.
Vanilla.flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

Vanilla.name: Multi-Shot
Vanilla.text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.
Vanilla.flavor: You see, it's all about throughput.

Vanilla.name: Oasis Snapjaw
Vanilla.flavor: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

Vanilla.name: Ogre Magi
Vanilla.text: Spell Damage +1
Vanilla.flavor: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

Vanilla.name: Old Murk-Eye
Vanilla.text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
Vanilla.flavor: He's a legend among murlocs.  "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.

Vanilla.name: Pit Lord
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
Vanilla.flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

Vanilla.name: Polymorph
Vanilla.text:
Transform a minion
into a 1/1 Sheep.
Vanilla.flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

Vanilla.name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
Vanilla.text: Taunt
Vanilla.flavor: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

Vanilla.name: Shadow Madness
Vanilla.text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
Vanilla.flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

Vanilla.name: Shadowflame
Vanilla.text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
Vanilla.flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

Vanilla.name: Silvermoon Guardian
Vanilla.text: Divine Shield
Vanilla.flavor: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

Vanilla.name: Soul of the Forest
Vanilla.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
Vanilla.flavor: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.

Vanilla.name: Spellbreaker
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Silence a_minion.
Vanilla.flavor: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders.  The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

Vanilla.name: Stormwind Knight
Vanilla.text: Charge
Vanilla.flavor: They're still embarrassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

Vanilla.name: Summoning Portal
Vanilla.text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
Vanilla.flavor: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

Vanilla.name: Swipe
Vanilla.text: Deal $4 damage to an enemy and $1 damage to all other enemies.
Vanilla.flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

Vanilla.name: Truesilver Champion
Vanilla.text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore #2_Health to it.
Vanilla.flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

Vanilla.name: Twilight Drake
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
Vanilla.flavor: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.

Vanilla.name: Violet Teacher
Vanilla.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
Vanilla.flavor: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

Vanilla.name: Water Elemental
Vanilla.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
Vanilla.flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

Vanilla.name: Windspeaker
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.
Vanilla.flavor: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

Vanilla.name: Abomination
Vanilla.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to ALL characters.
Vanilla.flavor: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

Vanilla.name: Arcanite Reaper
Vanilla.flavor: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

Vanilla.name: Assassin's Blade
Vanilla.flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

Vanilla.name: Assassinate
Vanilla.text: Destroy an enemy minion.
Vanilla.flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

Vanilla.name: Azure Drake
Vanilla.text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

Vanilla.name: Bane of Doom
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage to_a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
Vanilla.flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

Vanilla.name: Blessed Champion
Vanilla.text: Double a minion's Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

Vanilla.name: Bloodlust
Vanilla.text: Give your minions +3_Attack this turn.
Vanilla.flavor: blaarghghLLGHRHARAAHAHHH!!

Vanilla.name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
Vanilla.text: Taunt
Vanilla.flavor: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

Vanilla.name: Brawl
Vanilla.text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
Vanilla.flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

Vanilla.name: Captain Greenskin
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1/+1.
Vanilla.flavor: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

Vanilla.name: Darkscale Healer
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
Vanilla.flavor: Healing is just something she does in her free time.  It's more of a hobby really.

Vanilla.name: Doomguard
Vanilla.text: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
Vanilla.flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

Vanilla.name: Doomhammer
Vanilla.text: Windfury, Overload: (2)
Vanilla.flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

Vanilla.name: Druid of the Claw
Vanilla.text: Choose One - Charge; or +2 Health and Taunt.
Vanilla.flavor: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

Vanilla.name: Earth Elemental
Vanilla.text: Taunt. Overload: (3)
Vanilla.flavor: Nothing beats rock.

Vanilla.name: Elite Tauren Chieftain
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give both players the power to ROCK! (with a Power Chord card)
Vanilla.flavor: He's looking for a drummer.  The current candidates are: Novice Engineer, Sen'jin Shieldmasta', and Ragnaros the Firelord.

Vanilla.name: Explosive Shot
Vanilla.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion and $2 damage to adjacent ones.
Vanilla.flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

Vanilla.name: Faceless Manipulator
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
Vanilla.flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

Vanilla.name: Fen Creeper
Vanilla.text: Taunt
Vanilla.flavor: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast.   Boom, New Name!

Vanilla.name: Frostwolf Warlord
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
Vanilla.flavor: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley.  Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

Vanilla.name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
Vanilla.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

Vanilla.name: Gurubashi Berserker
Vanilla.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3_Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: No Pain, No Gain.

Vanilla.name: Harrison Jones
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
Vanilla.flavor: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

Vanilla.name: Holy Nova
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
Vanilla.flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

Vanilla.name: Holy Wrath
Vanilla.text: Draw a card and deal_damage equal to_its Cost.
Vanilla.flavor: C'mon Molten Giant!!

Vanilla.name: Nightblade
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
Vanilla.flavor: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

Vanilla.name: Nourish
Vanilla.text: Choose One - Gain 2_Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
Vanilla.flavor: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

Vanilla.name: Silver Hand Knight
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2_Squire.
Vanilla.flavor: It's good to be a knight.   Less so to be one's squire.

Vanilla.name: Spiteful Smith
Vanilla.text: Enrage: Your weapon has +2 Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

Vanilla.name: Stampeding Kodo
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

Vanilla.name: Starfall
Vanilla.text: Choose One - Deal $5 damage to a minion; or $2 damage to all enemy minions.
Vanilla.flavor: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

Vanilla.name: Stormpike Commando
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
Vanilla.flavor: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts.  They also bake a mean cupcake.

Vanilla.name: Stranglethorn Tiger
Vanilla.text: Stealth
Vanilla.flavor: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

Vanilla.name: Tundra Rhino
Vanilla.text: Your Beasts have Charge.
Vanilla.flavor: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos.  Or am I mistaken?

Vanilla.name: Venture Co. Mercenary
Vanilla.text: Your minions cost (3) more.
Vanilla.flavor: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

Vanilla.name: Archmage
Vanilla.text: Spell Damage +1
Vanilla.flavor: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

Vanilla.name: Argent Commander
Vanilla.text: Charge Divine Shield
Vanilla.flavor: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

Vanilla.name: Avenging Wrath
Vanilla.text: Deal $8 damage randomly split among all enemy characters.
Vanilla.flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

Vanilla.name: Blizzard
Vanilla.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
Vanilla.flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

Vanilla.name: Boulderfist Ogre
Vanilla.flavor: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

Vanilla.name: Cabal Shadow Priest
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
Vanilla.flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

Vanilla.name: Cairne Bloodhoof
Vanilla.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
Vanilla.flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

Vanilla.name: Dread Infernal
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
Vanilla.flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

Vanilla.name: Fire Elemental
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage.
Vanilla.flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

Vanilla.name: Force of Nature
Vanilla.text: Summon three 2/2 Treants with Charge that die at the end of the turn.
Vanilla.flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

Vanilla.name: Frost Elemental
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Freeze a_character.
Vanilla.flavor: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

Vanilla.name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Summon an AWESOME invention.
Vanilla.flavor: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor.  He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.

Vanilla.name: Hogger
Vanilla.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with_Taunt.
Vanilla.flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

Vanilla.name: Holy Fire
Vanilla.text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
Vanilla.flavor: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

Vanilla.name: Illidan Stormrage
Vanilla.text: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth.
Vanilla.flavor: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years. Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

Vanilla.name: Kidnapper
Vanilla.text: Combo: Return a minion to_its owner's hand.
Vanilla.flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

Vanilla.name: Lord of the Arena
Vanilla.text: Taunt
Vanilla.flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

Vanilla.name: Priestess of Elune
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Restore #4 Health to your hero.
Vanilla.flavor: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

Vanilla.name: Reckless Rocketeer
Vanilla.text: Charge
Vanilla.flavor: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

Vanilla.name: Savannah Highmane
Vanilla.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
Vanilla.flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

Vanilla.name: Siphon Soul
Vanilla.text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to_your hero.
Vanilla.flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

Vanilla.name: Starfire
Vanilla.text:
Deal $5 damage.
Draw a card.
Vanilla.flavor: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

Vanilla.name: Sunwalker
Vanilla.text: Taunt Divine Shield
Vanilla.flavor: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don’t worry!

Vanilla.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
Vanilla.text: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
Vanilla.flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

Vanilla.name: Temple Enforcer
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
Vanilla.flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

Vanilla.name: The Beast
Vanilla.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Pip Quickwit for your opponent.
Vanilla.flavor: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

Vanilla.name: The Black Knight
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
Vanilla.flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

Vanilla.name: Vanish
Vanilla.text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

Vanilla.name: Windfury Harpy
Vanilla.text: Windfury
Vanilla.flavor: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

Vanilla.name: Ancient of Lore
Vanilla.text: Choose One - Draw 2 cards; or Restore #5 Health.
Vanilla.flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

Vanilla.name: Ancient of War
Vanilla.text: Choose One - +5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
Vanilla.flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

Vanilla.name: Archmage Antonidas
Vanilla.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to_your hand.
Vanilla.flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

Vanilla.name: Baron Geddon
Vanilla.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
Vanilla.flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

Vanilla.name: Core Hound
Vanilla.flavor: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

Vanilla.name: Flamestrike
Vanilla.text: Deal $4 damage to all enemy minions.
Vanilla.flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

Vanilla.name: Gladiator's Longbow
Vanilla.text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
Vanilla.flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

Vanilla.name: Gorehowl
Vanilla.text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
Vanilla.flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

Vanilla.name: Guardian of Kings
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Restore #6 Health to your hero.
Vanilla.flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

Vanilla.name: Prophet Velen
Vanilla.text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
Vanilla.flavor: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

Vanilla.name: Ravenholdt Assassin
Vanilla.text: Stealth
Vanilla.flavor: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

Vanilla.name: Sprint
Vanilla.text: Draw 4 cards.
Vanilla.flavor: Rogues are not good joggers.

Vanilla.name: Stormwind Champion
Vanilla.text: Your other minions have +1/+1.
Vanilla.flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

Vanilla.name: War Golem
Vanilla.flavor: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

Vanilla.name: Al'Akir the Windlord
Vanilla.text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
Vanilla.flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

Vanilla.name: Grommash Hellscream
Vanilla.text: Charge Enrage: +6 Attack
Vanilla.flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

Vanilla.name: Gruul
Vanilla.text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
Vanilla.flavor: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

Vanilla.name: Ironbark Protector
Vanilla.text: Taunt
Vanilla.flavor: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

Vanilla.name: Lay on Hands
Vanilla.text: Restore #8 Health. Draw_3 cards.
Vanilla.flavor: A grammatically awkward life saver.

Vanilla.name: Ragnaros the Firelord
Vanilla.text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
Vanilla.flavor: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.
Vanilla.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 36 Classic Legendary cards.

Vanilla.name: Tirion Fordring
Vanilla.text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3_Ashbringer.
Vanilla.flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

Vanilla.name: Twisting Nether
Vanilla.text: Destroy all minions.
Vanilla.flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

Vanilla.name: Alexstrasza
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
Vanilla.flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

Vanilla.name: Cenarius
Vanilla.text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
Vanilla.flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

Vanilla.name: King Krush
Vanilla.text: Charge
Vanilla.flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

Vanilla.name: Lord Jaraxxus
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
Vanilla.flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

Vanilla.name: Malygos
Vanilla.text: Spell Damage +5
Vanilla.flavor: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

Vanilla.name: Nozdormu
Vanilla.text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their_turns.
Vanilla.flavor: Time to write some flavor text.

Vanilla.name: Onyxia
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
Vanilla.flavor: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

Vanilla.name: Ysera
Vanilla.text: At the end of your turn, add_a Dream Card to_your hand.
Vanilla.flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

Vanilla.name: Deathwing
Vanilla.text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your_hand.
Vanilla.flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

Vanilla.name: Mind Control
Vanilla.text: Take control of an enemy minion.
Vanilla.flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

Vanilla.name: Pyroblast
Vanilla.text: Deal $10 damage.
Vanilla.flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

Vanilla.name: Sea Giant
Vanilla.text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
Vanilla.flavor: See?  Giant.

Vanilla.name: Mountain Giant
Vanilla.text: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
Vanilla.flavor: His mother said that he was just big boned.

Vanilla.name: Molten Giant
Vanilla.text: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
Vanilla.flavor: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.
